skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Atago.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Atago, the second ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers and flagship of the Second Fleet. Many of my sisters have followed my banner into battle. No matter the mission, just leave everything to big sister here~!
skins.acquisition: Oh my, what a cute commander! Please allow your big sister Atago to take good care of you from now on!
skins.login: Welcome back! What should we do today?
skins.details: You shouldn't ask about a maiden's weight so casually~ *giggles*
skins.secretaryIdle1: It seems like... my shoulders are always sore...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander~ I can see you ogling me in a daze, you know?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hup! A little bug got into the room. You didn't see it? I'm confident in my good eyesight.
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh my~ Are you going to give me a massage?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You can touch me even more if you'd like... but there's no saying what might happen next... *giggles*

skins.shipDescription: Commander... Ahh, from now on, shouldn't I call you "darling?" Come and hold my hand... Ah, at times like these, I just can't help but to want to eat you up, dar~ling~
skins.acquisition: Commander... Ahh, from now on, shouldn't I call you "darling?" Come and hold my hand... Ah, at times like these, I just can't help but to want to eat you up, dar~ling~
skins.login: Commander, you didn't go to sleep that long ago. Did you miss big sister that badly~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even though I would be more than glad to allow you to feast your eyes upon me forever, you do need to get your work done~
skins.secretaryIdle2: What should I cook today... Commander, what would you like to have?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you're just too cute~ I just can't get enough of you~
skins.secretaryTouch: My, Commander, you're as spoiled as ever~ Here, come to big sister~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Dar~ling, if you continue like this, I won't be able to hold back any more~ Hehe... just kidding~

skins.shipDescription: The warm breeze that gently wraps around your skin, and delicate footsteps across the white sand... isn’t this the essence of summer? Commander, what does summer mean to you?
skins.acquisition: The warm breeze that gently wraps around your skin, and delicate footsteps across the white sand... isn’t this the essence of summer? Commander, what does summer mean to you?
skins.login: Phew... it sure is hot during the summer. Eh? Why is your face all red? Are you having heat stroke?
skins.details: Oh my, Commander... just what are you looking at~? Would you like me to bend over a bit more~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Kendo sword and sunglasses... Takao, did you really come here for vacation?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, you can join me under my parasol if you get too hot.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, want to watch me play beach volleyball?
skins.secretaryTouch: The best type of swimsuit? Definitely a bikini. Don’t you agree, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh my. There may only be one Earth, but Commander certainly has two hands~.

skins.shipDescription: Oh my, it's begun to snow. Commander, should we find a nice, quiet place to enjoy the view?
skins.acquisition: Oh my, it's begun to snow. Commander, should we find a nice, quiet place to enjoy the view?
skins.login: Commander, are you cold? Come and receive some warmth from your big sister~
skins.details: Commander, would you like to pet the puppy? She seems to have taken a liking to you~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, would you like to take a stroll with your big sister? I'd like some peace and quiet with just the two of us~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Akashi-chan? Don't fall asleep on top of the commander~
skins.secretaryTouch: Just the two of us, enjoying the solace of winter together... doesn't it set just the right mood?

skins.shipDescription: Student handbook, textbooks... twin guns, torpedoes... and what else... Huh? Commander, I'm just packing my bags for school... is there anything I'm missing?
skins.acquisition: Student handbook, textbooks... twin guns, torpedoes... and what else... Huh? Commander, I'm just packing my bags for school... is there anything I'm missing?
skins.login: What should I pack in Commander's lunchbox today~?
skins.details: Since I'm wearing a different outfit, it'd only feel right if you called me something different as well... Commander, why don't you try calling me "senpai?" Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Clubs, huh? There's nothing that interests me. You know, I'm much fonder of attending the "Going Home Club" with you, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, learning more about you is so much more interesting than anything they teach at school~
skins.secretaryIdle3: It'd be nice if going to school could teach Takao to soften up her uptight personality...
skins.secretaryTouch: Ehehe~ Commander, want to walk your big sister to school?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh my... Commander, do you really like this uniform so much? Well then, I suppose I wouldn't mind wearing it for you every day. Ehehe~

skins.shipDescription: So, you want big sister to be your "fleet queen"? You got it. But you'd better give it your all out there, or else I'll be upset with you!
skins.acquisition: So, you want big sister to be your "fleet queen"? You got it. But you'd better give it your all out there, or else I'll be upset with you!
skins.login: Commander~ Please do your best today? *smooch*
skins.details: I'm pretty sure it was on purpose, but these clothes are very revealing... Hehehe. Big sister thinks it's cute when you're honest like this.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, are you tired? Hehehe, why don't you lay down and rest for a bit? Where, you ask? Well of course... right here~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sigh, it's a pain to have to keep maintaining this pose... Commander, won't you help big sister up?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Akashi, you said you wanted to publish a lingerie photobook starring me, right? Then... Commander, would you like to see those photos?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, keep at it~ Big sister is always by your side?
